purpose.summary: This policy establishes compliance standards for state wage and hour laws affecting sales compensation across Henry Schein's multi-state operations. State laws impose varying requirements for commission agreements, payment timing, final pay, and recordkeeping. This policy ensures Henry Schein complies with all applicable state requirements while maintaining consistent compensation practices.
objectives: Establish framework for compliance (409a, state wage)

appliesTo: All sales compensation arrangements for employees working in the United States
Commission, bonus, and incentive payments subject to state wage laws
